course_title: Special Topics: Music: The Biz of Music
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 25 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: This course provides an overview of the fundamental concepts and business practices in the music industry. We will explore the issues of special concern to music creators and the changes that have evolved as a result of the shifts in the music business landscape caused by the digital revolution. Attention will be given to the theoretical foundations and current business practices in the music industry and the revenue flow from music consumer to creator. We will explore a range of topics, from artist development, music publishing, copyright, music distribution, music marketing and promotion, and performance rights. Music Majors: fulfills a general elective requirement.
course_description: Selected topics in Music. May be repeated when topic varies.
